metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25670 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was found in Linux Kernel where refcount leak inllcp_sock_bind() causing use-after-free which might lead to privilegeescalations.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').

linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
